sm.studystart ASC
is_today DESC, progress DESC, sm.studystart ASC
sm.studystart ASC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM studymanagement sm JOIN studymember smm ON sm.studyboardno = smm.studyboardno WHERE smm.memberId = #{memberId}

SELECT se.title AS event_title, start, end, className, sb.title AS study_title, smm.memberId, se.studyboardNo FROM studyevent se JOIN studyboard sb ON sb.no = se.studyboardno JOIN studymember smm ON smm.studyboardno = sb.no WHERE smm.memberId = #{memberId} AND end >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY start LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM studyevent se JOIN studyboard sb ON sb.no = se.studyboardno JOIN studymember smm ON smm.studyboardno = sb.no WHERE smm.memberId = #{memberId} AND end >= CURRENT_DATE
SELECT sb.no AS studyboardno, sb.title AS studyTitle FROM studymember sm JOIN studyboard sb ON sm.studyboardno = sb.no WHERE sm.memberId = #{memberId}

SELECT n.noticeNo, n.title AS noticeTitle, n.content, n.authorId, n.createdAt, n.studyboardno, sb.title AS studyTitle FROM notice n JOIN studyboard sb ON n.studyboardno = sb.no WHERE n.studyboardno = #{studyboardno} ORDER BY n.createdAt DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT sb.title AS studyTitle, n.noticeNo, n.title AS noticeTitle, n.content, n.authorId, n.createdAt FROM studymember sm JOIN studyboard sb ON sm.studyboardno = sb.no JOIN notice n ON sb.no = n.studyboardno WHERE sm.memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY sb.challengestart;
